snippet: The Pittsburgh Penguins and their star forward Evgeni Malkin agreed to an eight-year, $76 million deal that begins with the 2014-15 season.
abstract: Pittsburgh Penguins and their star forward Evgeni Malkin agree to an eight-year, $76 million deal that begins with the 2014-15 season.
lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Penguins and their star forward Evgeni Malkin agreed to an eight-year, $76 million deal that begins with the 2014-15 season.

headline.main: Penguins and Malkin Agree on Eight-Year Deal
